# subscriptionsToSave

**Instance Property**

The subscriptions to save to the database.

## Declaration

```swift
var subscriptionsToSave: [CKSubscription]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the subscriptions that you want to save. Its initial value is the array that you pass to the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifySubscriptionsOperation/init(subscriptionsToSave:subscriptionIDsToDelete:)] method. Modify this property as necessary before you execute the operation or submit it to a queue. After CloudKit saves the subscriptions, it begins generating push notifications according to their criteria.

## Configuring the Modify Subscriptions Operation

- **subscriptionIDsToDelete**: The IDs of the subscriptions that you want to delete.
